title: pArvai onru pOdumE shankha paduma nidhi
sahitya:
pArvai onru pOdumE shankha paduma nidhi iraNDum valiya tAndAlanna


anupallavi

  kArmigil pOlanna kadirenna matiyenna karu vizhi kaDalinai shaTrE 
tirandu karuNai mazhai pozhindEn ahamkuLirum


caraNam    annai yashOdai aruginilE shenru veNNai tiruDiyuNDa vindai shollap-pOnAl 
annaiyin pinnE shenru aNaindu koNDu ninru shollAdE enru kaNNAl sholliDum kaLLappArvai
